description:
The program helps you with daily work in Windows. Here you can find all the necessary functions to manage your data stock. You can take FreeCommander anywhere – just copy the portableation directory on a CD or USB-Stick – and you can evenwork with this program on a foreign computer.

      **Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is 
      out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
      let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: FreeCommander is an easy-to-use alternative to the standard windows file manager.
author: Marek Jasinski
